stimulusHtml: Which of the following best explains why the destructive scale of European warfare increased in the twentieth century?

features.html: The following question refers to the topic of contextualizing twentieth-century global conflict.

choicesHtml: European states could now draw on colonial empires for resources.
European states began to implement mass mobilization of conscript armies.
European states deployed new weapons and manufacturing technologies.
European states were influenced by Marxist and communist ideologies.
